subject: Application Received - Senior Software Engineer
content:
Thank you for your interest in joining our team!

We have received your application for the following position:

Position: Senior Software Engineer
Company: TechCorp Inc
Location: San Francisco, CA

You can view your application status here:
https://boards.greenhouse.io/techcorp/jobs/1234567

We'll review your application and get back to you soon.

Best regards,
TechCorp Recruiting Team
